outline:
1. to mourn, be dark
    1. (Qal) to be dark
    2. (Hiphil)
      1. to darken
      2. to cause to mourn
    3. (Hithpael) to grow dark
kjv_def: be black(-ish), be (make) dark(-en), [idiom] heavily, (cause to) mourn.
strongs_def: to be ashy, i.e. darkcolored; by implication, to mourn (in sackcloth or sordid garments)
